events.name: onStart
events.description: Fired when a website has requested payments by the virtue of it having a valid payment pointer.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: A UUID (v4) to identify the session. Each onStart event gets a unique sessionId.

events.name: onStop
events.description: Fired when browser believes that a payment should be stopped (user navigated away, payment pointer changed, user asked not to pay given website etc.).

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: Session ID for which the payments should be stopped.

events.name: onPause
events.description: Fired when user has navigated away from a tab that had an active payment session.

events.name: onResume
events.description: Fired when user has navigated back to a tab that previously had an active payment session. The payment tokens may not be valid anymore when this event is fired.

functions.name: completePayment
functions.description: Notify the browser and the website of the payment progress.

functions.name: refresh
functions.description: Request the browser to fetch the SPSP response again as the old one has expired. Resolves with a sessionId for a new payment session, and causes a stop and a start event to be fired.
